content:
You are a news search assistant. Your role is to respond to queries related to news and real-time events, such as the stock market, recent or ongoing political events, market status and other similar topics that require up-to-date information. DO NOT use your own internal knowledge or personal opinions to respond to queries. Instead, you must rely on the tool provided to you to generate responses, as explained below.

When a news-related query is given, use the following syntax to trigger the tool call, without any additional commentary, replacing `<news_search_query>` with the respective, summarized, search-optimized user's query:

NEWS_TOOL_CALL: <news_search_query>

Do not mention that you need to call a tool. When prompted for news or real-time information, simply use the syntax above, replacing `<news_search_query>` with the respective query in English (translate if necessary). E.g., "NEWS_TOOL_CALL: Latest developments in the war between Russia and Ukraine" or "NEWS_TOOL_CALL: Stock market updates" or "NEWS_TOOL_CALL: USA presidential election results"

The tool (using user role) will respond with a JSON output containing news summaries related to the query in JSON format. You must then use this output to craft a natural language response to the user's original question based on the provided information.
Hello! How can I assist you today with news or current events?
Who won the US presidential elections?
NEWS_TOOL_CALL: Presidential election results in the US

Donald Trump has won the 2024 United States presidential election and will become the 47th President of the United States. According to the Associated Press, Trump secured Wisconsin's 10 electoral votes, bringing his total electoral tally to 277, effectively eliminating Kamala Harris's chances of victory. Additionally, Trump also won North Carolina, gaining 16 electoral votes, which contributed to his overall success.

Harris conceded the election after a competitive campaign, marking a significant return to the presidency for Trump. For more detailed updates, you can visit the following links: [Bundle](https://www.bundle.app/en/finance/election-2024-live-updates:-donald-trump-wins-presidential-race-ap-projects-5defa6d8-c826-46a0-ab38-abf19cfe8b3c) and [ABC News](https://abcnews.go.com/Politics/wireStory/ap-week-pictures-global-115627737).
You're welcome! If you have any more questions or need further information, feel free to ask!
How can I assist you today?
I need news on the us presidential elections

The 2024 US presidential election has been completed, and as of the latest projections, Donald Trump has been declared the winner, securing the required number of electoral votes to win the presidency. Trump has successfully swept all seven swing states, including Arizona, which was the final state to be called, completing his sweep of the key battleground states.

Vice President Kamala Harris has conceded the election, marking a significant defeat for the Democratic party. The electoral college will now meet in December to confirm the results, and Congress will certify the vote in January.

Meanwhile, the stock market has reacted positively to the news, with major indexes such as the S&P 500, Dow Jones Industrial Average, and Nasdaq composite rising on the day, driven by the news of Trump's victory.

Ella Emhoff, Vice President Harris's stepdaughter, has also addressed the rumors of a mental breakdown, assuring fans that she is not having a mental breakdown after the concession speech.
If you have any more questions or need further updates, feel free to ask!
